original_title: André Rieu & Friends - Live In Maastricht
overview: "If you can't come to Maastricht, we'll come to you," says Andre himself. "Come and enjoy the music on the big screen in the comfort of your local cinema." 2013 is shaping up to be Andre's most spectacular concert year yet - so don't miss out!
title: André Rieu & Friends - Live In Maastricht
